question_title: Will the interest in “luigi mangione” change between 2026-02-02 and 2026-02-15 according to Google Trends?
summary: Interest in "luigi mangione" likely peaked around Jan 30 (death penalty ruling) and will decay by Feb 15. The Feb 6 unexpected court hearing may cause a temporary spike, but appears to be procedural (scheduling). Natural decay from the Jan 30 news spike should dominate, leading to lower interest by Feb 15 than on Feb 2. However, the unknown reason for the Feb 6 hearing adds meaningful uncertainty.

factors.description: Jan 30 death penalty ruling was major news - Feb 2 starts from elevated baseline that should decay
Google Trends show exponential decay after news spikes - status quo is declining interest
Feb 6 unexpected hearing creates uncertainty - could generate new spike if substantive
Feb 6 hearing appears procedural (trial scheduling) - less newsworthy than substantive rulings
No trial until July - limited catalysts for sustained interest increase
